course_description: Students will learn several methods for separating and identifying small molecule organic reactants and products. They will make qualitative determinations based on quantitative data and equilibria and acidÂ¿base properties. Students who withdraw from the laboratory course must withdraw from the corequisite lecture course. *Exceptions to the withdrawal policy require Chemistry department approval.
prerequisites:
CHEM_OX 150 & CHEM_OX 150L prerequisites or equivalent transfer credit. 
Student must enroll in CHEM_OX 202L first, then in CHEM_OX 202. Students must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap.
